name: Herma
greetingDialogue: Hey, I wanted to drop by!
negativeReaction: I can appreciate any hairstyle now.

dialogues.text: I wasn't sure I was happy with the haircut you gave me last time, but something amazing happened. I got a lot more compliments!
There are still people that tell me I'm doing a bad thing for society. But I'm convinced I'm doing the right thing.

responses.text: Do what you think is right.

dialogues.text: You sure are. People say I inspire them, whatever that means. Although others still say this is hurtful to everyone.
I will! It's like seeing all the beautiful diversity of plants and animals in the gardens, but with people! I think that's special.
To agree with me! It's like seeing all the beautiful diversity of plants and animals in the gardens, but with people! I think that's special.
Same here! It's like seeing all the beautiful diversity of plants and animals in the gardens, but with people! I think that's special.
Yes! It's like seeing all the beautiful diversity of plants and animals in the gardens, but with people! I think that's special.
